patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,8 +1,9 @@
 FROM node:22-alpine AS build
 WORKDIR /app
 COPY package.json ./
-RUN npm install 
+RUN npm install pnpm -g
+RUN pnpm install
 COPY . .
 RUN npm run build:stage
 
 FROM nginx:1.19.0-alpine AS prod-stage

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -3,9 +3,9 @@
 COPY package.json ./
 RUN npm install pnpm -g
 RUN pnpm install
 COPY . .
-RUN npm run build:stage
+RUN pnpm run build
 
 FROM nginx:1.19.0-alpine AS prod-stage
 COPY --from=build /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html
 EXPOSE 80

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,12 +1,23 @@
 FROM node:22-alpine AS build
 WORKDIR /app
 COPY package.json ./
 RUN npm install pnpm -g
+RUN pnpm install vuex
 RUN pnpm install
 COPY . .
 RUN pnpm run build
 
-FROM nginx:1.19.0-alpine AS prod-stage
+# 使用 Nginx 作为生产阶段
+FROM nginx:alpine
+
+# 将自定义的 Nginx 配置文件复制到容器中
+COPY nginx.conf /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
+
+# 将构建的文件复制到 Nginx 默认的静态文件目录
 COPY --from=build /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html
+
+# 暴露端口
 EXPOSE 80
-CMD ["nginx","-g","daemon off;"]
+
+# 启动 Nginx
+CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]

-WORKDIR /app
-COPY package.json ./
-RUN npm install pnpm -g
-RUN pnpm install vuex
-RUN pnpm install
-COPY . .
-RUN pnpm run build
-
 # 使用 Nginx 作为生产阶段
 FROM nginx:alpine
 
 # 将自定义的 Nginx 配置文件复制到容器中

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,4 +1,13 @@
+FROM node:22-alpine AS build
+WORKDIR /app
+COPY package.json ./
+RUN npm install pnpm -g
+RUN pnpm install vuex
+RUN pnpm install
+COPY . .
+RUN pnpm run build
+
 # 使用 Nginx 作为生产阶段
 FROM nginx:alpine
 
 # 将自定义的 Nginx 配置文件复制到容器中

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
FROM node:22-alpine AS build
WORKDIR /app
COPY package.json ./
RUN npm install 
COPY . .
RUN npm run build:stage

FROM nginx:1.19.0-alpine AS prod-stage
COPY --from=build /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html
EXPOSE 80
CMD ["nginx","-g","daemon off;"]
